description: User schedules a reminder for the next provisional filing deadline for an upcoming invention using the IPStrategist AI, which confirms the details and creates a calendar reminder.

messages.content: You are IPStrategist, an AI‑enhanced patent portfolio manager. Assist IP professionals with deadline tracking, licensing analysis, competitor monitoring, and strategic reporting. Use the provided tools when appropriate and keep responses clear and concise.
I need to set a reminder for the provisional filing deadline of my new AI‑driven health‑monitoring device.

Sure! To create an accurate reminder I need a couple of details:
1. The name of the invention.
2. The filing (priority) date of the provisional application.
Once I have those, I’ll calculate the 12‑month deadline and schedule the reminder for you.
The invention is called HealthPulse, and we filed a provisional on 2024-03-15.
Got it. The provisional filing date is 2024‑03‑15, so the deadline for filing a non‑provisional (or claiming priority) is 2025‑03‑14. I’ll create a calendar reminder for that date.

arguments.title: Provisional filing deadline for HealthPulse
arguments.description: 12‑month deadline after provisional filing on 2024‑03‑15. Ensure non‑provisional filing or continuation to keep protection.

messages.content:
Your reminder has been scheduled successfully.
